S.FORM: United arab emirates hya' ga cyux maki' tay 24 00 N, 54 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 83,600 sq km (maki' tay 115ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 83,600 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 5,927,482. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 4.60 , lhlahuy hya' ga 0.038, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 91.60 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Abu Dhabi. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 2 na tay mawpuw sazing byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, aring ryax 3 squ byacing tay 11 sa kawas 2004 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
